snippet: The chase ended in violence after the S.U.V. got stuck in traffic on a side street in Washington Heights and several motorcyclists attacked its driver, the police said.
abstract: Swarm of motorcycles commandeers three lanes of northbound Henry Hudson Parkway in Manhattan, surrounding SUV that then struck a motorcycle that had come to a near-stop in the center lane; moments later, blocked by the fallen biker's fellow riders, SUV barrels through crowd, setting off a chase that ended in violence when the vehicle became stuck in traffic and driver Alexian Lien was pulled from car and attacked; no arrests are made.
lead_paragraph: The chase ended in violence after the S.U.V. got stuck in traffic on a side street in Washington Heights and several motorcyclists attacked its driver, the police said.

headline.main: After Motorcyclist Is Struck, Driver Is Pulled From S.U.V. and Beaten, the Police Say
headline.print_headline: After Motorcyclist Is Struck, Driver Is Pulled From S.U.V. And Beaten, the Police Say
